verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: more swipes at Canada and its prime minister over trade issues] [ARGM-TMP: as he settled in for a summit with North Korea in Singapore] .
President Trump took more swipes at Canada and its prime minister over trade issues as [ARG1: he] [V: settled] [ARGM-DIR: in] [ARGM-PNC: for a summit with North Korea in Singapore] .
